title: A Spy in the Desert, Excerpt 2
description:
A second excerpt from A Spy in the Desert, now available on Bandcamp and iTunes!

For the very first time, you can hear Cecil Palmer’s secret! This monologue was only performed to one person at every show, but now, you can hear it for yourself! Plus, over an hour of brand new material which has never been heard on the podcast.

Our scouts on Patreon also get two exclusive bonus tracks featuring Dylan Marron as Carlos the Scientist and Hal Lublin as Steve Carlsberg. Join our membership program at $5 or above to listen.
itunes:subtitle: A second excerpt from A Spy in the Desert, now available on Bandcamp and iTunes!
itunes:author: Night Vale Presents
